file_content.text: Idiot. Lost your artifact and my special-made blasters.
Just wait until I get my blaster pointed at those thieves.
Less talking, more hunting.
Let's go, then.
They'll face much worse from me.
Your blaster's nothing.
You take your creepy powers and I'll take my blaster, and we'll see who kills the most, huh.
Exactly how deep into the desert do we have to go?
You think they got far?
Well, there's a speeder that'll take us out so far, but the coordinates Wilkes had are a little further out than that.
Come on. The sooner we get out there, the better chance we have of showing them thieves what's what.
You--you idiots! You'll never get it now! Not the artifact, not the blasters, nothing!
Give me the artifact, now!
Shut up.
I think we knocked the sense out of him.
He's mad.
We beat you, now tell us where they are.
Enough of your secrets.
You're so stupid. The great Andronikos Revel chases me across five planets only to fail!
Even gets a Sith on his side, and they both fail!
Talk sense!
The artifact--it's cursed. It's cursed.
Yeah, I figured that one out.
They--they took it. Just like I took it from you. Took it all--the blasters, the artifact, the money.
Where did they take it?
Explain.
You'll never get to them. They went out into the deep desert.
Who's they?
The men I sent to guard the cargo. The artifact made them mad, and they took it. They took all of it!
Tell us where they took it!
Enough! [Shock.]
Argh!
Chase them if you like. They went out into the deep desert!
They left weeks ago. The Sand People'll eat you before you ever catch them!
I've heard enough. Now give me one good reason not to blast your teeth through the back of your skull.
Do it--maybe he'll finally shut up.
Yes, please kill him.
There's no need to blast anyone's teeth through anyone's skull.
Calm down, Andronikos.
I came for my revenge. I'm going to have it. And it'll be bloody.
He's not worth it.
Let it go.
I haven't been chasing this son of a Hutt halfway across the galaxy to back down now.
Was it really worth it?
Are you glad you did it?
Don't make me use my lightning on you.
I have ways of getting my way.
Fine. Whatever you say.
Heh. Never thought I'd see the big bad Andronikos Revel lower his blaster like that.
Get out of here, Wilkes. I never want to see that overgrown wart you call a face again.
Sure thing, Nikky. And good luck in the deep desert. Heh.
Fine, take your revenge.
All right.
I'll have no more part in it.
Do what you will.
I've been waiting to do this for a long time, Wilkes. Can't say it was nice knowing you, either.
Heh. I have no regrets, Andronikos. Least of all this.
I have no more use for this one.
I'm finished. [Kill Wilkes.]
Argh!
What did you do that for? That was supposed to be my revenge!
There was no longer any reason to keep him alive.
I was done with him.
Watch it, pirate.
I guess I got carried away.
Sorry.
You knew I wanted to be the one to kill him.
You're--you're--oh, never mind. Let's just go.
Well, well. Andronikos Revel. I'm surprised they let you out of Imperial prison.
And you brought a Sith to help you. How cute. But see these guys? They'll crush you and your Sith.
Give us the artifact, Wilkes.
You don't want to do this.
The artifact, huh. The scary, scary artifact I took from Andronikos here.
Enough.
I am not cute. I am deadly.
Cute?
Let me guess. You're here for the artifact. The one the Empire was so keen on getting just before I crushed Andronikos.
Would you believe he called me a nobody? "A worthless, mangy, skinny little nobody."
So I took his ship, his crew, his cargo, his blasters, and what else? Oh, his girl. Who's nobody now, Nikky?
I'm going to rip out your throat and laugh while you try to scream.
I must know where the artifact is first.
Restrain yourself, Andronikos.
All of this chatter is making me bloodthirsty.
Less talk, more killing.
We'll see who lands the killing blow.
Not if I get to him first.
You'll never beat me, and you'll never get your artifact.
Boys--kill the Sith, but keep Andronikos alive. I'll want to play with him a little longer.
